attributes.action: Review the English Football Associations ability to govern grassroots football
attributes.additional_details: To review the recent proposals for changes to the future of youth football in England, question the process that has lead to the changes and force a consultation with those involved in grass roots football who will be impacted.
attributes.background: Review the Football Association ability to govern grassroots football in light of the recent proposals for changes to the future of youth football and the impact on participation of children and volunteers.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the English Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
